original_text: Yes, now that I know Christ Jesus as my Lord, that is the most valuable thing. Nothing else is important at all. I have thrown everything else away, so that I can serve Christ. All those other things are like dirt to me. I think about them like that, so that I can have Christ.
korean_text: 또한 모든 것을 해로 여김은 내 주 그리스도 예수를 아는 지식이 가장 고상하기 때문이라 내가 그를 위하여 모든 것을 잃어버리고 배설물로 여김은 그리스도를 얻고

sentences.original_text: Yes, now that I know Christ Jesus as my Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 내가 그리스도 예수를 나의 주로 알게 되었으니

sentences.original_text: that is the most valuable thing
Nothing else is important at all
I have thrown everything else away
so that I can serve Christ
All those other things are like dirt to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 다른 것들은 나에게는 흙과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: I think about them like that
so that I can have Christ
